dataformat.name: asn1
dataformat.title: ASN.1 File
dataformat.description: The ASN.1 data format is used for file transfer with telecommunications protocols.
dataformat.label: dataformat,transformation,file

usingIterator.description: If the asn1 file has more then one entry, the setting this option to true, allows to work with the splitter EIP, to split the data using an iterator in a streaming mode.

clazzName.description: Name of class to use when unmarshalling

contentTypeHeader.description: Whether the data format should set the Content-Type header with the type from the data format if the data format is capable of doing so. For example application/xml for data formats marshalling to XML, or application/json for data formats marshalling to JSon etc.
